title: ArtyTorrent Pack 69-Garage 2-Step+Breakbeats-WAV samples
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 69-Garage 2-Step+Breakbeats-WAV samples
--------------------------------------------------------

A special pack of 2-step beats for UK Garage/bassline house, plus another folder of miscellaneous breakbeats. Tempo ranges from 130-139 bpm.

Torrent contains 2 RAR files with 191 loops
-------------------------------------------
Garage 2-step 132-136 (47 loops)
Misc Breaks 130-139 (144 loops)

Samples are from a variety of sources including CDs by EastWest, Sony/Sonic Foundry, and Loopology/Syntrillium, and have all been normalized and acidized as 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz. Approx tempo is included in each filename.

--
Arty - "Speeding to the garage"
18th February 2008.


P.S. The plan is to keep posting medium sized packs of drum loops (with the tempo gradually increasing) with the occasional full CD uploaded too. I have several things I could upload. Let me know if you are particularly interested in any of the following:
Spectrasonics Atmosphere, Zero-G Deep House v2, Loopmasters Raw Power, Cakewalk Dimension Pro VSTi, Loopmasters Drum n Bass Producer, Sampletank 2 + all instruments, Zero-G Nu Jointz, Zero-G Sounds of the 70s.... or something else that I&#039;ve probably got but haven&#039;t listed.
